# This file was generated by Jucer2CMake from BlocksMonitor.jucer

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../../../../../cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


if(NOT DEFINED BlocksMonitor_jucer_FILE)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "BlocksMonitor_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

get_filename_component(BlocksMonitor_jucer_FILE
  "${BlocksMonitor_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)

if(NOT EXISTS "${BlocksMonitor_jucer_FILE}")
  message(FATAL_ERROR "No such file: ${BlocksMonitor_jucer_FILE}")
endif()

get_filename_component(BlocksMonitor_jucer_DIR
  "${BlocksMonitor_jucer_FILE}" DIRECTORY
)


jucer_project_begin(
  PROJECT_NAME "BlocksMonitor"
  PROJECT_VERSION "1.0.0"
  # COMPANY_NAME
  # COMPANY_WEBSITE
  # COMPANY_EMAIL
  PROJECT_TYPE "GUI Application"
  BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER "com.yourcompany.BlocksInfo"
  BINARYDATACPP_SIZE_LIMIT "Default"
  # BINARYDATA_NAMESPACE
  # PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS
  PROJECT_ID "X7eXs7"
)

if(APPLE)
  set(CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES Debug Release)

  add_compile_options(
    $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-O0>
    $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-O3>
  )
endif()

if(MSVC_VERSION EQUAL 1900) # VS2015
  set(CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES Debug Release)

  add_compile_options(
    $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:/Od>
    $<$<CONFIG:Release>:/O2>
  )
endif()

if(MSVC_VERSION EQUAL 1800) # VS2013
  set(CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES Debug Release)

  add_compile_options(
    $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:/Od>
    $<$<CONFIG:Release>:/O2>
  )
endif()

jucer_project_end()
